posts.title: La hobby y el ZELDA.....pues va a ser que si jugaron xD
posts.content:
hello, I'm french but I'll speak in English because my Spanish is really poor.
Well in this forum I learned one thing... NEVER CLICK ON BORRAR T_T, I thought that borrar meant "send" ... but apparently not

So, I would like to thank KEKO, who is a star now 8), the whole world looked at HIS *scans*

Well it's just in France ...

So, I'll show you some GOOD scans :

(Deleted by moderator, please dont post copyrright images)

Thank you and good bye ^^
